EmailTemplate.name: 201909_Americas_StandardAero_PEEF_M:1_kcr.201909_Americas_StandardAero_PrimusEli
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Current Primus Elite Incentives End 12/31!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
As the year draws to a close, StandardAero and Honeywell want to extend a reminder that the current Honeywell promotions and incentives for the DU-875 LCD Display and Primus Elite upgrade expire on 12/31/2019.
Current incentives include:
Upgrade Path Incentives
One for One Upgrade
- 12-month warranty - $35,000 Honeywell trade-in credit per display replaced - $2,500 discount on Honeywell MSP contract per display unit (on new or extended MSP contract)
Primus Elite Enhanced Features
- 12-month warranty - Up to $140,000 in Honeywell trade-in credits - Receive your first year of Honeywell MSP coverage free of charge - $10,000 off regular MSP contract price for the second and third year
Be sure to contact StandardAero to schedule your upgrade before 12/31/2019 and take advantage of these offers.
Sincerely,
Jerry Sanders Director, Avionics Program Management & Business Development StandardAero
